pageProduct.name: Avene A-Oxitive Smoothing Water Cream 30ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

• Rich in Avène Thermal Spring Water for its soothing and anti-irritating properties
• Light water-cream texture, refreshing and silky on the skin
• Skin is protected, hydrated and glowing
• Protects against external aggressors including free radicals, antioxidant properties CLINICALLY PROVEN 24H hydration**
• Paraben free
• Formulated to minimise the risk of allergic reaction, non-comedogenic PROVEN EFFICACY: 90% skin is brighter after 5 days* 82% fine lines and wrinkles are smoothed after 5 days* 82% pores are reduced after 5 days*

*% of satisfaction – User test on 197 women, cream applied at least once daily for 5 days
**Measurement of the Hydration Index on 19 subjects after 1 application on the forearm

Common Uses

Anti-Aging Moisturiser for tired skin, dull complexion, fine lines and wrinkles, uneven skin texture. For all types of sensitive skin

Ingredients

AVÈNE THERMAL SPRING WATER (AVENE AQUA). GLYCERIN. PROPYLENE GLYCOL. PPG-3 MYRISTYL ETHER. DIMETHICONE. PENTYLENE GLYCOL. ASCORBYL GLUCOSIDE. HYDROXYETHYL ACRYLATE/SODIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYL TAURATE COPOLYMER. C14-22 ALCOHOLS. CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC GLUCOSIDE. CETRIMONIUM BROMIDE. CITRIC ACID. DISODIUM EDTA. FRAGRANCE (PARFUM). MICA. POLYSORBATE 60. SILICA. SODIUM CITRATE. SODIUM HYALURONATE. SODIUM HYDROXIDE. SORBITAN ISOSTEARATE. TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891). WATER (AQUA). XANTHAN GUM.

Directions

Apply in the morning and/or evening, after serum, to the face, neck and décolleté.
